title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
summary: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard[lower-alpha 1] is a 2017 survival horror game developed and published by Capcom. A major installment in the Resident Evil series, the player controls Ethan Winters as he searches for his long-missing wife in a derelict plantation occupied by an infected family, solving puzzles and fighting enemies. Resident Evil 7 diverges from the more action-oriented Resident Evil 5 and Resident Evil 6, returning to the franchise's survival horror roots, emphasizing exploration.  It is the first main series game to use a first-person view.
